賠.definition: to compensate for loss; to indemnify; to suffer a financial loss

賠上.definition: to pay for sth with the loss of (one's health etc); to have sth come at the cost of (one's reputation etc)

賠了夫人又折兵.pinyin: péi le fū rén yòu zhé bīng
賠了夫人又折兵.definition: lit. having given away a bride, to lose one's army on top of it (idiom); fig. to suffer a double loss after trying to trick the enemy

賠付.definition: to pay out; to compensate; (insurance) payment

賠小心.definition: to be conciliatory or apologetic; to tread warily in dealing with sb

賠禮.definition: to offer an apology; to make amends

賠錢.definition: to lose money; to suffer a financial loss; to pay for damages

賠錢貨.definition: unprofitable goods; item that can only be sold at a loss; daughter (so called in former times because daughters required a dowry when they married)
